original: unfold monotonic in HF, HG. apply mkmon. - unfold Union2. apply mon_m in HF. apply mon_m in HG. intros R. apply HF. apply HG. - intros R S H1 H2. apply mon_t with (F := F) in H1. apply mon_t with (F := G) in H1. apply union2_evolve; auto. apply HF. apply HG. apply H2. - intros R S H1 H2. apply mon_a with (F := F) in H1. apply mon_a with (F := G) in H1. apply union2_evolve; auto. apply HF. apply HG. apply H2.
